patch:
@@ -5,7 +5,7 @@ name: Java CI with Gradle
 
 on:
   push:
-    branches: [ master ]
+    branches: [ junit ]
   pull_request:
     branches: [ master ]
 
@@ -23,4 +23,4 @@ jobs:
     - name: Grant execute permission for gradlew
       run: chmod +x gradlew
     - name: Build with Gradle
-      run: ./gradlew build
+      run: ./gradlew test
